recipes.label: Hint: A Revolutionary Performance: Not Enough!
recipes.startdescription: There is something here, but I cannot quite reach it. If I could stage a performance with a stronger tie to Forge.

recipes.previewdescription: I may open with the unmerciful beat of progress, with notes that spark like tinder. the audience shifts in their seats and seek to change their lives, and that energy I can apply to other projects too.
recipes.label: Perform a Show laced with the Intent of Forge
recipes.startdescription: The air is shivering under my shouts, my songs, my revolutions. Each audience member can feel the sweat pool on their back and their their fingers itch for action.
Now comes the time for me to channel this energy into whatever target I desire.

slots.label: Direction
slots.description: Now that my Intent is set, I have to set my Direction. What do I wish to affect?
